name: Time Travel Mod
short_description: A technology and exploration mod themed around time traveling through history.

name: Disable Custom Worlds Advice
short_description: A simple utility Minecraft mod that removes the annoying "Experimental settings" warning screen.

name: Advocat
short_description: A script that streamlines your jutge.org assignments by automatically compiling and testing your work. Beware the documentation is written in Catalan.

name: SISA Assembler
short_description: An assembler for the SISC-vn computer, written in Rust!
